title: RAG Test Interface - Design Document
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. add that for Testing, it should use Browser MCP to browse, input, screenshot, network logs, and console logs. Don't create any test scripts esp. for test pages and apis.

Only use Browser MCP for testing and curl for quick api calls
